title: Bug 44088Cannot expire session via html manager webapp
description: The html manager webapp done not work correctly when clicking the expiresessions button. The idle param is missing from the form.The following html shows this bug...<form method="POST" action="/manager/html/expire?path=/"<small<input type="submit" value="Expire sessions"with idle≥<input type="text" name="expire" size="5" value="30"minutes</small</formThe name of the text input should be idle.
